channel.title: Another request
channel.description: Strange as it sounds .... when i try to ban on my owner account rights=3 it wont work... but i made an account named reforced and it works.... why cant i ban using other accounts?

item.title: Another request
item.dc:creator: @def_leppard def leppard
item.description:
@def_leppard wrote:

exactly goto char files, find your acc name, change the player rights to 3 and this reforced character to 1 or 0 if you dont want it to have ban

Read full topic

item.title: Another request
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

make sure the command lets admins ban, it might just be set the name reforced, if it does just rename it with your accounts name or make it work for everyone who has higher playerRights than 2

Read full topic
